Class InternshipApplication

java.lang.Object
internship_management_system.internships.InternshipApplication
public class InternshipApplication extends Object
Class representing an internship application

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipApplication

      public InternshipApplication(int id, InternshipOpportunity opportunity, Student student)
      Constructor for InternshipApplication
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the internship application, also the index in the DataStorage list
      opportunity - The internship opportunity applied for
      student - The student who applied for the internship opportunity

    • finalizeApplicationStatus

      public void finalizeApplicationStatus(boolean offerInternship)
      Finalize the application status Only meant to be used by CompanyRep
      Parameters:
      offerInternship - whether to offer the internship

    • confirmPlacement

      public void confirmPlacement(boolean accept)
      Confirm placement for the internship application meant to be used by Student
      Parameters:
      accept - whether to accept the internship offer

    • requestWithdraw

      public void requestWithdraw()
      Request to withdraw the internship application meant to be used by Student

    • confirmWithdraw

      public void confirmWithdraw(boolean approve)
      Confirm or reject the withdrawal request meant to be used by CareerCentreStaff, but also to withdraw other offers when student accepts one
      Parameters:
      approve - whether to approve the withdrawal request

    • matchesFilter

      public boolean matchesFilter(InternshipApplicationFilterSettings filter)
      Check if the internship application matches the given filter settings
      Parameters:
      filter - The filter settings to match against
      Returns:
      true if the internship application matches the filter, false otherwise
